name: Ancient Sapphire Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., fly 80 ft.
description: The Ancient Sapphire Dragon is a Gargantuan creature known for its immense power and distinctive sapphire scales. It possesses exceptional psionic abilities and a formidable presence that makes it a credible foe in any campaign.
memorable: Its predictive abilities allow it to anticipate enemy moves and counter strategies effectively, making it more than just a brute in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory and outsmart adversaries using its cognitive and psychic powers.
relations: Commonly associated with other high-level dragons and magical creatures, possibly serving as a master to lesser psionic beings.
environment: Often found in mountainous regions, ancient ruins, or areas rich in arcane energies.
strengths: Immunities to psychic damage and fatigue, high intelligence and wisdom, and powerful psionic abilities.
weaknesses: Reliance on specific abilities can temporarily leave it vulnerable during strategic engagements.
attacks: Employs a Multiattack feature, using its lethal Bite and Claw attacks, alongside potent psionic options like Psionic Wave.
most_powerful_ability: Discognitive Breath, dealing massive psychic damage and inflicting ongoing effects whilst potentially incapacitating foes.
senses: It possesses a passive Perception score of 27, indicating exceptional awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in Arcana and History with a notable focus on Insight and Perception, showcasing its intellectual and perceptual capabilities.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws a limited number of times each day.
Predictive Harmonics enables it to never be surprised and negates disadvantage.
Far Thoughts allows psionic observation up to 100 miles away.
Can cast a variety of spells, including mind blank and etherealness, without material components.
Prophesy Doom instills dread in attackers, linking them to a potential death within hours.
spellcasting: Innate Spellcasting allows it to cast spells like detect thoughts and etherealness without material components.
